Converter

Class EnergyConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • Converter.EnergyConverter

  • public class EnergyConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will convert between any of the energy units available in the EnergyUnits enum. It is intended to be included as a member of the Converter package.
    Version:
    Sept 12, 2018
    Author:
    Jeremy Banks (M2104)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  EnergyConverter.EnergyUnits
      This enum holds all of the available units that you can convert between.

        public EnergyConverter()

    • Method Detail

      • Convert

        public static double Convert(double value,
                             EnergyConverter.EnergyUnits currentUnits,
                             EnergyConverter.EnergyUnits newUnits)
        Parameters:
        value - The quantity of "currentUnits" that you want to convert.
        currentUnits - The unit that you would like to convert from. To be selected from the "EnergyUnits" enum.
        newUnits - The unit that you would like to convert to. To be selected from the "EnergyUnits" enum.
        Returns:
        The quantity of "newUnits" for a given quantity of "currentUnits".

      • CaloriesToJoules

        public static double CaloriesToJoules(double Calories)
        Parameters:
        Calories - The number of calories that will be converted into Joules.
        Returns:
        The number of Joules for the given number of Calories.

      • BTUToElectronVolts

        public static double BTUToElectronVolts(double BTUs)
        Parameters:
        BTUs - The number of BTUs that will be converted into ElectronVolts.
        Returns:
        The number of ElectronVolts for the given number of BTUs.

      • WattHourToTOE

        public static double WattHourToTOE(double wattHours)
        Parameters:
        wattHours - The number of WattHours that will be converted into Tons of Oil Equivalent.
        Returns:
        The number of Tons of Oil Equivalent for the given number of WattHours.

      • TCEToTherm

        public static double TCEToTherm(double TCE)
        Parameters:
        TCE - The number of Tons of Carbon Equivalent that will be converted into Therms.
        Returns:
        The number of Therms for the given number of Tons of Carbon Equivalent.

      • ErgToCalories

        public static double ErgToCalories(double ERG)
        Parameters:
        ERG - The number of Ergs that will be converted into Calories.
        Returns:
        The number of Calories for the given number of Ergs.
